action.action-desc: Mr. Rosendale (for himself and Mr. Bost) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To terminate the Electronic Health Record Modernization Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.header: Termination of Electronic Health Record Modernization Program

subsection.text: The Secretary of Veterans Affairs may not carry out the Electronic Health Record Modernization Program.
Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Veterans Affairs shall carry out the following activities:

paragraph.text: Abolish the Electronic Health Record Modernization Integration Office.

Transfer any activities or functions carried out under such office that are not terminated pursuant to this section to the Veterans Health Administration or the Office of Information and Technology of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

With respect to each facility of the Veterans Health Administration that uses the electronic health record system implemented pursuant to the Electronic Health Record Modernization Program, revert the facility to instead use the Veterans Health Information Systems and Technology Architecture and the Computerized Patient Record System of the Department.

subsection.header: No expansion during implementation of termination
subsection.text: During the period beginning on the date of the enactment of this Act and ending on the date on which the Secretary carries out subsection (b), the Secretary may not carry out any activities to implement the electronic health record system implemented pursuant to the Electronic Health Record Modernization Program at a facility of the Veterans Health Administration where such system is not being used as of the date of the enactment of this Act.

paragraph.text: The Secretary may not exercise any option periods or optional tasks under any contract under the Electronic Health Record Modernization Program.

Nothing in this section may be construed to require the Secretary to terminate any contract, task order, modification, or other similar instrument, under the Electronic Health Record Modernization Program before the expiration of the period of performance of such contract, task order, modification, or other similar instrument.

paragraph.header: Oversight of Electronic Health Record Modernization Program
paragraph.text: Section 503 of the Veterans Benefits and Transition Act of 2018 (Public Law 115–407; 38 U.S.C. 5701 note prec.) is repealed.
